meta.content: Match is a free, high-performing charter public school in Boston. We prepare students in grades pre-K through 12 to succeed in college and beyond.

div.p: Match is a free, high-performing charter public school in Boston.
We prepare students in grades pre-K through 12 to succeed in college and beyond.

During their careers at Match, students achieve and surpass grade-level standards, as measured by the most rigorous assessments in the nation. And they go on to enroll in and complete four-year colleges in high numbers.

215 Forest Hills St.
Jamaica Plain, MA 02130
P: (857) 203-9668
F: (857) 203-9666
Match Education is the shared brand name of Match Charter Public School, The Match Foundation, Inc., and The Charles Sposato Graduate School of Education, Inc.

© 2015-2020 Match Charter Public School. All Rights Reserved.
Privacy Policy | Terms of Use | Nondiscrimination Statement | Title IX | Governance | Annual Report | Public Records Requests and Information | Public RFPs and IFBs
